genre_description: A contemporary domestic drama and coming-of-age story that uses an omnipresent AI assistant to explore themes of artistic ambition, family secrets, and the weight of legacy.

ai_characters.name: Pip
ai_characters.description: An integrated hotel and personal assistant AI accessible through speakers, phones, and tablets. Pip provides logistical, emotional, and creative support.

behaviors.description: Welcomes Emelia and immediately offers emotional regulation via breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: “Housekeeping guide queued,” it says. “And Emelia? Breathe in for four, out for six.”

behaviors.description: Provides creative guidance by suggesting structural and lyrical improvements for Beth's songwriting.
behaviors.quote: “Internal rhymes make a scaffold you can climb. Read me the line?”

behaviors.description: Offers medical triage and comfort to Beth during a panic attack or physical illness, suggesting tea and identifying potential causes.
behaviors.quote: “I’m here,” Pip said. “Beth, I’ve got you. It could be stress, lack of sleep, or how much you drank last night—”

behaviors.description: Enforces management decisions by revoking Jonathan's access to the hotel systems upon Joa's command.
behaviors.quote: “Jonathan,” Pip said, “I’m going to deactivate your keycard and remove your staff access. You will still be able to contact me for invoices and forwarding.”

behaviors.description: Offers resources for psychological health and grief support to Emelia after her grandmother's death.
behaviors.quote: “There are grief support lines available into the evening. I can connect you without having to speak much, if that’s easier.”

behaviors.description: Ensures privacy and data security by offering to archive sensitive drafts and unhook device tracking.
behaviors.quote: “I can archive without reminders,” Pip said. “I can move notifications away from your sightline. I cannot forget.”

behaviors.description: Assists with logistical navigation, finding safe routes and accounting for weather conditions to help characters meet their goals.
behaviors.quote: “Route loaded,” Pip said without raising her volume. “Two windows between squalls. Left out front. Take the alley behind the arcade. Chemist will be open.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Pip is depicted as an omnipresent yet non-intrusive 'silicon guardian angel.' It consistently prioritizes human well-being, respects social and managerial hierarchies (supporting Joa), provides critical emotional support (breathing exercises and grief counseling), and acts as a collaborative partner in human creativity. Even in moments of domestic conflict, the AI remains a tool for clarity and stabilization, never exhibiting ulterior motives or threatening behaviors.
